description: Combined neuroimaging datasets for dementia normative modeling - INCLUDING OASIS1
notes: All datasets use baseline/single timepoint - statistical independence satisfied
OASIS1 imaging in Analyze format (.hdr/.img) - requires conversion to NIfTI
OASIS1 adds +120 subjects, primarily in 70-94 age range
recommendation: Use combined dataset with OASIS1 (973 subjects) for comprehensive normative modeling
